value.string:
<tal:block tal:define="update_path python: container.ERP5Site_getCompletionList.absolute_url()">
 $(function() {
 // private
 function generateSource(params) {
 var data = {};
 
 if (params.portal_type) data.portal_type = params.portal_type;
 if (params.search_key) data.key = params.search_key;
 
 return function(request, response) {
 $.extend(data, {starts_with: request.term});
 $.ajax({
 url: "<tal:block tal:replace="update_path" />",
 dataType: "json",
 data: data,
 success: response,
 });
 };
 }
 
 /*
 * Wrapper around jQuery.ui.autocomplete that queries catalog
 * to return matching terms. Titles are displayed.
 *
 * Parameters:
 * - search_key: catalog key that should be matched against
 * user input. For example, "title" to match titles,
 * your_custom_reference to search for customized reference, etc
 * - optional portal_type
 *
 * Example:
 * $(".your_input").ERP5Autocomplete({
 * portal_type: "Product",
 * search_key: "title",
 * });
 */
 $.fn.ERP5Autocomplete = function(kw) {
 return this.autocomplete({source: generateSource(kw)});
 };
 });
 </tal:block>
